sql_init_queries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Listings (id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT NOT NULL, description TEXT NOT NULL, isbn TEXT NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(13,4) NOT NULL, category TEXT NOT NULL, seller TEXT NOT NULL, listing_password TEXT NOT NULL, status TEXT NOT NULL, buyer TEXT, billing_info TEXT, shipping_info TEXT)

sql_queries.select_all_active_listings: SELECT id,title,description,isbn,price,category,seller,status FROM Listings WHERE status='active' OR status='purchased'
sql_queries.select_listing_public: SELECT id,title,description,isbn,price,category,seller,status FROM Listings WHERE id=? LIMIT 1
sql_queries.select_listing_private: SELECT buyer,billing_info,shipping_info FROM Listings WHERE id=? LIMIT 1
sql_queries.create_listing: INSERT INTO Listings (title, description, isbn, price, category, seller, listing_password, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
sql_queries.update_listing: UPDATE Listings SET title = ? WHERE id = ?
sql_queries.select_password: SELECT listing_password FROM Listings WHERE id=? LIMIT 1
sql_queries.purchase_listing: UPDATE Listings SET status="purchased", buyer=?, billing_info=?, shipping_info=? WHERE id=?
